name: Stench
effect_entry: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
effect_entry_ko: 악취를 풍겨서 공격했을 때 상대가 풀죽을 때가 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.  This ability does not stack with a held item.  Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.

name: Drizzle
effect_entry: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 날씨를 비로 만든다.
effect_detail: The weather changes to rain for 5 turns when this Pokémon enters battle. If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drought, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay. If the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, or mysterious air current, this ability will not be activated.

name: Speed Boost
effect_entry: The Pokémon's Speed stat is boosted every turn.
effect_entry_ko: 매 턴 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.

name: Battle Armor
effect_entry: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
effect_entry_ko: 단단한 껍질에 보호받아 상대의 공격이 급소에 맞지 않는다.
effect_detail: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to shell armor.

name: Sturdy
effect_entry: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 꽉 찼을 때 기술을 받아도 일격에 쓰러지지 않는다. 일격필살 기술의 효과도 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

name: Damp
effect_entry: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.
effect_entry_ko: 주변을 습하게 함으로써 자폭 등 폭발하는 기술을 아무도 못 쓰게 한다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

name: Limber
effect_entry: The Pokémon's limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.
effect_entry_ko: 유연한 몸으로 인해 마비 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed.  If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

name: Sand Veil
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
effect_entry_ko: 모래바람일 때 회피율이 올라간다.
effect_detail: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

name: Static
effect_entry: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.
effect_entry_ko: 정전기를 몸에 둘러 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 마비시킬 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.  Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.

name: Volt Absorb
effect_entry: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
effect_entry_ko: 전기타입의 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 회복한다.
effect_detail: Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.

name: Water Absorb
effect_entry: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
effect_entry_ko: 물타입의 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 회복한다.
effect_detail: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

name: Oblivious
effect_entry: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.
effect_entry_ko: 둔감해서 헤롱헤롱이나 도발 상태가 되지 않는다. 위협을 당해도 동요하지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.  If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

name: Cloud Nine
effect_entry: Eliminates the effects of weather.
effect_entry_ko: 모든 날씨의 영향이 없어진다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.  This ability functions identically to air lock.

name: Compound Eyes
effect_entry: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
effect_entry_ko: 복안을 가지고 있어 기술의 명중률이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.  This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.

name: Insomnia
effect_entry: The Pokémon's insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.
effect_entry_ko: 잠들지 못하는 체질이라 잠듦 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.  This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  This ability functions identically to vital spirit in battle.

name: Color Change
effect_entry: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.
effect_entry_ko: 상대에게 받은 기술의 타입으로 자신의 타입이 변화한다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move, the Pokémon's type changes to match the move.  If the Pokémon has two types, both are overridden.  The Pokémon must directly take damage; for example, moves blocked by a substitute will not trigger this ability, nor will moves that deal damage indirectly, such as spikes.  This ability takes effect on only the last hit of a multiple-hit attack.  In Pokémon Colosseum and XD: Gale of Darkness, this ability does not take effect on Shadow-type moves.

name: Immunity
effect_entry: The Pokémon's immune system prevents it from being poisoned.
effect_entry_ko: 체내에 면역을 가지고 있어 독 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.  This includes bad poison.  If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

name: Flash Fire
effect_entry: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 불꽃타입의 기술로 공격받으면 불꽃을 받아서 자신이 사용하는 불꽃타입의 기술이 강해진다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to fire-type moves.  Once this Pokémon has been hit by a Fire move, its own Fire moves will inflict 1.5× as much damage until it leaves battle.  This ability has no effect while the Pokémon is frozen.  The Fire damage bonus is retained even if the Pokémon is frozen and thawed or the ability is lost or disabled.  Fire moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This ability takes effect even on non-damaging moves, i.e. will o wisp.

name: Shield Dust
effect_entry: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.
effect_entry_ko: 인분에 보호받아 기술의 추가 효과를 받지 않게 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.  An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.

name: Own Tempo
effect_entry: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.
effect_entry_ko: 마이페이스라서 혼란 상태가 되지 않는다. 위협을 당해도 동요하지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be confused.  If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

name: Suction Cups
effect_entry: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.
effect_entry_ko: 흡반으로 지면에 달라붙어 포켓몬을 교체시키는 기술이나 도구의 효과를 발휘하지 못하게 한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by moves such as whirlwind.  dragon tail and circle throw still inflict damage against this Pokémon.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the success rate while fishing is increased.

name: Intimidate
effect_entry: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 위협해서 상대를 위축시켜 상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, the opponent's Attack is lowered by one stage.  In a double battle, both opponents are affected.  This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle, but will not take effect again if lost and reobtained without leaving battle.  This ability has no effect on an opponent that has a substitute.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

name: Shadow Tag
effect_entry: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 그림자를 밟아 도망치거나 교체할 수 없게 한다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  Other Pokémon with this ability are unaffected.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.

name: Rough Skin
effect_entry: The Pokémon's rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 받았을 때 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 까칠까칠한 피부로 상처를 입힌다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.  This ability functions identically to iron barbs.

name: Wonder Guard
effect_entry: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 효과가 굉장한 기술만 맞는 불가사의한 힘.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to damaging moves that are not super effective against it.  Moves that inflict fixed damage, such as night shade or seismic toss, are considered super effective if their types are.  Damage not directly dealt by moves, such as damage from weather, a status ailment, or spikes, is not prevented.  This ability cannot be copied with role play or traded away with skill swap, but it can be copied with trace, disabled with gastro acid, or changed with worry seed.  This Pokémon can still use Role Play itself to lose this ability, but not Skill Swap.  If this Pokémon has a substitute, this ability will block moves as usual and any moves not blocked will react to the Substitute as usual.

name: Levitate
effect_entry: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 땅에서 뜨는 성질 때문에 땅타입의 기술로 공격받지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.  This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.  This ability is not disabled during roost.

name: Effect Spore
effect_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.
effect_entry_ko: 공격으로 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 독이나 마비, 잠듦 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.  Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.

name: Synchronize
effect_entry: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.
effect_entry_ko: 자신이 걸린 독이나 마비, 화상을 상대에게 옮긴다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, the Pokémon who gave this Pokémon that ailment is also given the ailment.  This ability passes back bad poison when this Pokémon is badly poisoned.  This ability cannot pass on a status ailment that the Pokémon did not directly receive from another Pokémon, such as the poison from toxic spikes or the burn from a flame orb.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, wild Pokémon have a 50% chance of having the lead Pokémon's nature, and a 50% chance of being given a random nature as usual, including the lead Pokémon's nature.  This does not work on Pokémon received outside of battle or roaming legendaries.

name: Clear Body
effect_entry: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
effect_entry_ko: 상대 기술이나 특성으로 능력이 떨어지지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.  This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through guard swap, heart swap, or power swap.  This ability functions identically to white smoke in battle.

name: Natural Cure
effect_entry: The Pokémon's status conditions are cured when it switches out.
effect_entry_ko: 지닌 포켓몬으로 돌아오면 상태 이상이 회복된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment when it is switched out for another Pokémon.  If this ability is acquired during battle, the Pokémon is cured upon leaving battle before losing the temporary ability.

name: Lightning Rod
effect_entry: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 전기타입의 기술을 자신에게 끌어모아 데미지를 받지 않고 특수공격을 올린다.
effect_detail: All other Pokémon's single-target electric-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon if it is an eligible target.  Other Pokémon's Electric moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it.  If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected.  When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon.  follow me takes precedence over this ability.  If the Pokémon is a ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves, its immunity prevents the Special Attack boost.

name: Serene Grace
effect_entry: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.
effect_entry_ko: 하늘의 은총 덕분에 기술의 추가 효과가 나오기 쉽다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves have twice their usual effect chance.  An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, flamethrower's chance of burning the target is doubled, but protect's chance of success and air cutter's increased critical hit rate are unaffected.  secret power is unaffected.

name: Swift Swim
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
effect_entry_ko: 비가 오는 날씨일 때 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

name: Chlorophyll
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 맑을 때 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

name: Illuminate
effect_entry: By illuminating its surroundings, the Pokémon prevents its accuracy from being lowered.
effect_entry_ko: 주변을 밝게 하여 명중률이 떨어지지 않는다.
effect_detail: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.  This ability has no effect in battle.

name: Trace
effect_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 상대의 특성을 트레이스해서 같은 특성이 된다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, it copies a random opponent's ability.  This ability cannot copy flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode.

name: Huge Power
effect_entry: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 물리공격의 위력이 2배가 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled while in battle.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  This ability functions identically to pure power.

name: Poison Point
effect_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
effect_entry_ko: 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.

name: Inner Focus
effect_entry: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.
effect_entry_ko: 단련한 정신 덕분에 상대의 공격에 풀죽지 않는다. 위협을 당해도 동요하지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot flinch.

name: Magma Armor
effect_entry: The Pokémon's hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.
effect_entry_ko: 뜨거운 마그마를 몸에 둘러서 얼음 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be frozen.  If a Pokémon is frozen and acquires this ability, it will immediately thaw out; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or flame body.

name: Water Veil
effect_entry: The Pokémon's water veil prevents it from being burned.
effect_entry_ko: 물의 베일을 몸에 둘러서 화상 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be burned.  If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

name: Magnet Pull
effect_entry: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing by pulling them in with magnetism.
effect_entry_ko: 강철타입의 포켓몬을 자력으로 끌어모아 도망칠 수 없게 한다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing steel-type Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, Steel-type Pokémon have a higher encounter rate.

name: Soundproof
effect_entry: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
effect_entry_ko: 소리를 차단하여 소리 기술의 영향을 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to moves flagged as being sound-based.  heal bell is unaffected.  uproar still prevents this Pokémon from sleeping.  This Pokémon can still receive a Perish Song counter through baton pass, and will retain a Perish Song counter if it acquires this ability after Perish Song is used.  howl, roar of time, sonic boom, and yawn are not flagged as sound-based.

name: Rain Dish
effect_entry: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
effect_entry_ko: 비가 오는 날씨일 때 조금씩 HP를 회복한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.

name: Sand Stream
effect_entry: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 날씨를 모래바람으로 만든다.
effect_detail: The weather changes to a sandstorm when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm. If the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, or mysterious air current, this ability will not be activated.

name: Pressure
effect_entry: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.
effect_entry_ko: 프레셔를 줘서 상대가 쓰는 기술의 PP를 많이 줄인다.
effect_detail: Moves targetting this Pokémon use one extra PP.  This ability stacks if multiple targets have it.  This ability still affects moves that fail or miss.  This ability does not affect ally moves that target either the entire field or just its side, nor this Pokémon's self-targetted moves; it does, however, affect single-targetted ally moves aimed at this Pokémon, ally moves that target all other Pokémon, and opponents' moves that target the entire field.  If this ability raises a move's PP cost above its remaining PP, it will use all remaining PP.  When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

name: Thick Fat
effect_entry: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 두꺼운 지방으로 보호되고 있어 불꽃타입과 얼음타입의 기술의 데미지를 반감시킨다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

name: Early Bird
effect_entry: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 잠듦 상태가 되어도 2배 빠르게 깨어날 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

name: Flame Body
effect_entry: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
effect_entry_ko: 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being burned.  Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or magma armor.

name: Run Away
effect_entry: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 야생 포켓몬으로부터 반드시 도망칠 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.

name: Keen Eye
effect_entry: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered. It also ignores the target's stages in evasion.
effect_entry_ko: 날카로운 눈 덕분에 명중률이 떨어지지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy lowered.  This ability does not prevent any accuracy losses other than stat modifiers, such as the accuracy cut from fog; nor does it prevent other Pokémon's evasion from making this Pokémon's moves less accurate.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative accuracy modifiers through heart swap.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.

name: Hyper Cutter
effect_entry: The Pokémon's prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 힘이 자랑인 집게를 가지고 있어 상대가 공격을 떨어뜨리지 못하게 한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This ability does not prevent any Attack losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Attack cut from a burn.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Attack modifiers through heart swap or power swap.

name: Pickup
effect_entry: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
effect_entry_ko: 상대가 사용한 도구를 주워 올 때가 있다. 모험 중에도 주워 온다.
effect_detail: At the end of each turn, if another Pokémon consumed or Flung a held item that turn, this Pokémon picks up the item if it is not already holding one.  After each battle, this Pokémon has a 10% chance of picking up an item if it is not already holding one.  The air balloon and eject button cannot be picked up.  The items that may be found vary by game, and, since Pokémon Emerald, by the Pokémon's level.  This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.

name: Truant
effect_entry: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.
effect_entry_ko: 기술을 사용하면 다음 턴은 쉰다.
effect_detail: Every second turn on which this Pokémon should attempt to use a move, it will instead do nothing ("loaf around").  Loafing around interrupts moves that take multiple turns the same way paralysis, flinching, etc do.  Most such moves, for example bide or rollout, are simply cut off upon loafing around.  Attacks with a recharge turn, such as hyper beam, do not have to recharge; attacks with a preparation turn, such as fly, do not end up being used.  Moves that are forced over multiple turns and keep going through failure, such as outrage, uproar, or any move forced by encore, keep going as usual.  If this Pokémon is confused, its confusion is not checked when loafing around; the Pokémon cannot hurt itself, and its confusion does not end or come closer to ending.  If this Pokémon attempts to move but fails, e.g. because of paralysis or gravity, it still counts as having moved and will loaf around the next turn.  If it does not attempt to move, e.g. because it is asleep or frozen, whatever it would have done will be postponed until its next attempt; that is, it will either loaf around or move as usual, depending on what it last did.  This ability cannot be changed with worry seed, but it can be disabled with gastro acid, changed with role play, or traded away with skill swap.

name: Hustle
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.
effect_entry_ko: 자신의 공격이 높아지지만 명중률이 떨어진다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.  Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

name: Cute Charm
effect_entry: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.
effect_entry_ko: 자신에게 접촉한 상대를 헤롱헤롱하게 만들 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

name: Plus
effect_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
effect_entry_ko: 플러스나 마이너스의 특성을 가진 포켓몬이 동료에 있으면 자신의 특수공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.

name: Minus
effect_entry: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
effect_entry_ko: 플러스나 마이너스의 특성을 가진 포켓몬이 동료에 있으면 자신의 특수공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.

name: Forecast
effect_entry: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨의 영향을 받아 물타입, 불꽃타입, 얼음타입 중 하나로 변화한다.
effect_detail: During rain, strong sunlight, or hail, this Pokémon's type changes to water, fire, or ice, respectively, and its form changes to match.  This ability has no effect for any Pokémon other than castform.  If the weather ends or becomes anything that does not trigger this ability, or a Pokémon with air lock or cloud nine enters battle, this Pokémon's type and form revert to their default.  If this ability is lost or disabled, this Pokémon cannot change its current type and form until it regains its ability.

name: Sticky Hold
effect_entry: The Pokémon's held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 점성이 높은 몸에 도구가 달라붙어 있어 상대에게 도구를 뺏기지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's hold item cannot be removed by other Pokémon.  Damaging moves that would remove this Pokémon's item can still inflict damage against this Pokémon, e.g. knock off or pluck.  This Pokémon can still use moves that involve the loss of its own item, e.g. fling or trick.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the encounter rate while fishing is increased.

name: Shed Skin
effect_entry: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
effect_entry_ko: 몸의 껍질을 벗어 던져 상태 이상을 회복할 때가 있다.
effect_detail: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

name: Guts
effect_entry: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 상태 이상이 되면 근성을 보여서 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

name: Marvel Scale
effect_entry: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.
effect_entry_ko: 상태 이상이 되면 이상한 비늘이 반응해서 방어가 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Defense.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

name: Liquid Ooze
effect_entry: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.
effect_entry_ko: 해감액을 흡수한 상대는 강렬한 악취로 데미지를 받아 HP가 줄어든다.
effect_detail: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain.  dream eater is unaffected.

name: Overgrow
effect_entry: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 줄었을 때 풀타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

name: Blaze
effect_entry: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 줄었을 때 불꽃타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

name: Torrent
effect_entry: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 줄었을 때 물타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

name: Swarm
effect_entry: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 줄었을 때 벌레타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.

name: Rock Head
effect_entry: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
effect_entry_ko: 반동을 받는 기술을 사용해도 HP가 줄지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon does not receive recoil damage from its recoil moves.  struggle's recoil is unaffected.  This ability does not prevent crash damage from missing with jump kick or high jump kick.

name: Drought
effect_entry: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 날씨를 맑음으로 만든다.
effect_detail: The weather changes to strong sunlight for 5 turns when this Pokémon enters battle. If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay. If the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, or mysterious air current, this ability will not be activated.

name: Arena Trap
effect_entry: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.
effect_entry_ko: 배틀에서 상대를 도망칠 수 없게 한다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  flying-type Pokémon and Pokémon in the air, e.g. due to levitate or magnet rise, are unaffected.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

name: Vital Spirit
effect_entry: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
effect_entry_ko: 의기양양해져서 잠듦 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.  This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  This ability functions identically to insomnia in battle.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

name: White Smoke
effect_entry: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
effect_entry_ko: 하얀 연기의 보호를 받아 상대가 능력을 떨어뜨리지 못하게 한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.  This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis; nor self-inflicted stat drops, such as the Special Attack drop from overheat; nor opponent-triggered stat boosts, such as the Attack boost from swagger.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through guard swap, heart swap, or power swap.  This ability functions identically to clear body in battle.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Pure Power
effect_entry: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 요가의 힘으로 물리공격의 위력이 2배가 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled in battle.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  This ability functions identically to huge power.

name: Shell Armor
effect_entry: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
effect_entry_ko: 단단한 껍질의 보호를 받아 상대의 공격이 급소에 맞지 않는다.
effect_detail: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

name: Air Lock
effect_entry: Eliminates the effects of weather.
effect_entry_ko: 모든 날씨의 영향이 없어진다.
effect_detail: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.  This ability functions identically to cloud nine.

name: Tangled Feet
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.
effect_entry_ko: 혼란 상태일 때는 회피율이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.

name: Motor Drive
effect_entry: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 전기타입의 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.  This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.

name: Rivalry
effect_entry: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.
effect_entry_ko: 성별이 같으면 투쟁심을 불태워 강해진다. 성별이 다르면 약해진다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender.  If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.

name: Steadfast
effect_entry: The Pokémon's determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.
effect_entry_ko: 풀죽을 때마다 불굴의 마음을 불태워 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon flinches, its Speed rises one stage.

name: Snow Cloak
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in snow.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 눈일 때 회피율이 올라간다.
effect_detail: During hail/snowstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

name: Gluttony
effect_entry: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 줄어들면 먹을 나무열매를 HP가 절반일 때 먹어 버린다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

name: Anger Point
effect_entry: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 급소에 공격이 맞으면 크게 분노해 공격력이 최대가 된다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon receives a critical hit, its Attack rises to the maximum of 6 stages.  This ability will still take effect if the critical hit is received by a substitute.

name: Unburden
effect_entry: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
effect_entry_ko: 지니던 도구가 없어지면 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon uses or loses its held item, its Speed is doubled.  If it gains another item or leaves battle, this bonus is lost.  This includes when the Pokémon drops its item because of knock off.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  There is no notification when this ability takes effect.

name: Heatproof
effect_entry: The Pokémon's heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 내열인 몸으로 인해 불꽃타입 공격의 데미지를 반감한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.

name: Simple
effect_entry: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon's stat changes.
effect_entry_ko: 능력 변화가 평소의 2배가 된다.
effect_detail: Each stage of this Pokémon's stat modifiers acts as two stages.  These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6.  This Pokémon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.

name: Dry Skin
effect_entry: Restores the Pokémon's HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 비가 오는 날씨나 물타입의 기술로 공격받으면 HP가 회복되고 맑을 때나 불꽃타입의 기술로 공격받으면 줄어든다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn during strong sunlight, but it heals for 1/8 of its HP each turn during rain.  This Pokémon takes 1.25× as much damage from fire-type moves, but whenever a water move hits it, it heals for 1/4 its maximum HP instead.

name: Download
effect_entry: The Pokémon compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat — whichever will be more effective.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 방어와 특수방어를 비교해서 낮은 쪽 능력에 맞춰서 자신의 공격이나 특수공격을 올린다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, its Attack or Special Attack, whichever corresponds to its opponents' weaker total defensive stat, rises one stage.  In the event of a tie, Special Attack is raised.  This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle.

name: Iron Fist
effect_entry: Powers up punching moves.
effect_entry_ko: 펀치를 사용하는 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon.  sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".

name: Poison Heal
effect_entry: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
effect_entry_ko: 독 상태가 되면 HP가 줄지 않고 증가한다.
effect_detail: If this Pokémon is poisoned, it will heal for 1/8 of its maximum HP after each turn rather than taking damage.  This includes bad poison.

name: Adaptability
effect_entry: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 자신과 같은 타입인 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.

name: Skill Link
effect_entry: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
effect_entry_ko: 연속 기술을 사용하면 항상 최고 횟수로 사용할 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon always hits five times with two-to-five-hit moves, such as icicle spear.  It also bypasses the accuracy checks on triple kick's second and third hits.

name: Hydration
effect_entry: Cures the Pokémon's status conditions in rain.
effect_entry_ko: 비가 오는 날씨일 때 상태 이상이 회복된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

name: Solar Power
effect_entry: In harsh sunlight, the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat is boosted, but its HP decreases every turn.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 맑으면 특수공격이 올라가지만 매 턴 HP가 줄어든다.
effect_detail: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.

name: Quick Feet
effect_entry: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
effect_entry_ko: 상태 이상이 되면 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Normalize
effect_entry: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
effect_entry_ko: 사용하는 기술의 타입이 모두 노말타입이 된다. 위력이 조금 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves all act as if they were normal-type.  Moves that inflict typeless damage do so as usual.  Moves of variable type, such as hidden power, are affected.  They otherwise work as usual, however; weather ball, for example, is always forced to be Normal, but it still has doubled power and looks different during weather.  As thunder wave is prevented by immunities, unlike most non-damaging moves, it does not affect ghost-type Pokémon under the effect of this ability.

name: Sniper
effect_entry: If the Pokémon's attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 급소에 맞혔을 때 위력이 더욱 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.

name: Magic Guard
effect_entry: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
effect_entry_ko: 공격 이외에는 데미지를 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon is immune to damage not directly caused by a move.  For example, this Pokémon takes no damage from from weather, recoil, status ailments, or spikes, but it still suffers from the Attack cut when burned, and a life orb will still power up this Pokémon's moves without damaging it.  Anything that directly depends on such damage will also not happen; for example, leech seed will neither hurt this Pokémon nor heal the opponent, and Pokémon with a jaboca berry or rowap berry will not consume the berry when hit by this Pokémon.  The following are unaffected: struggle, pain split (whether used by or against this Pokémon), belly drum, substitute, curse, moves that knock the user out, and damage from confusion.  This Pokémon will neither lose nor regain HP if it drains HP from a Pokémon with liquid ooze.  If this Pokémon is badly poisoned, the poison counter is still increased each turn; if the Pokémon loses this ability, it will begin taking as much damage as it would be if it had been taking increasing damage each turn.

name: No Guard
effect_entry: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
effect_entry_ko: 노가드전법에 따라 서로가 사용하는 기술이 반드시 맞게 된다.
effect_detail: Moves used by or against this Pokémon never miss.  One-hit KO moves are unaffected.  Moves affected by this ability can hit Pokémon during the preparation turn of moves like dig or fly.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

name: Stall
effect_entry: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.
effect_entry_ko: 기술을 사용하는 순서가 반드시 마지막이 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon moves last within its priority bracket.  Multiple Pokémon with this ability move in order of Speed amongst themselves.  The full incense and lagging tail take precedence over this ability; that is, Pokémon with these items move after Pokémon with this ability.  Pokémon with both this ability and one of these items are delayed as much as if they had only the item.  This ability works as usual during trick room: Pokémon with this ability will move in reverse order of Speed after Pokémon without it.

name: Technician
effect_entry: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.
effect_entry_ko: 위력이 약한 기술의 위력을 올려서 공격할 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves have 1.5× their power if their base power is 60 or less.  This includes moves of variable power, such as hidden power and magnitude, when their power is 60 or less.  helping hand's power boost is taken into account for any move, as is defense curl's power boost for rollout.

name: Leaf Guard
effect_entry: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 맑을 때는 상태 이상이 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon cannot be given a major status ailment during strong sunlight.  This ability does not heal prior status ailments.  rest will fail altogether with this ability in effect.  yawn will immediately fail if used on this Pokémon during strong sunlight, and an already-used Yawn will fail if the weather turns to strong sunlight in the meantime.

name: Klutz
effect_entry: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
effect_entry_ko: 지니고 있는 도구를 쓸 수 없다.
effect_detail: In battle, this Pokémon cannot use its held item, nor will the item have any passive effect on the battle, positive or negative.  This Pokémon also cannot use fling.  The Speed cut from the iron ball and the effort items (the macho brace, power weight, power bracer, power belt, power lens, power band, and power anklet) is unaffected.  Items that do not directly affect the battle, such as the exp share, the amulet coin, or the soothe bell, work as usual.  All held items work as usual out of battle.  Other moves that use the held item, such as natural gift and switcheroo, work as usual.

name: Mold Breaker
effect_entry: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
effect_entry_ko: 상대 특성에 방해받지 않고 상대에게 기술을 쓸 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.  For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.  Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.  An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.  When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.  This ability functions identically to teravolt and turboblaze.

name: Super Luck
effect_entry: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 대운을 가지고 있어 상대의 급소에 공격이 맞기 쉽다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.

name: Aftermath
effect_entry: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.
effect_entry_ko: 기절했을 때 접촉한 상대에게 데미지를 준다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

name: Anticipation
effect_entry: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
effect_entry_ko: 상대가 지닌 위험한 기술을 감지할 수 있다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, if one of its opponents has a move that is super effective against it, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit knockout move, all participating trainers are notified.  The move itself is not revealed; only that there is such a move.  Moves that inflict typeless damage, such as future sight, and moves of variable type, such as hidden power, count as their listed types.  counter, metal burst, mirror coat, and one-hit KO moves to which this Pokémon is immune do not trigger this ability.

name: Forewarn
effect_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 상대가 지닌 기술을 하나만 간파한다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals the move with the highest base power known by any opposing Pokémon to all participating trainers.  In the event of a tie, one is chosen at random.  Moves without a listed base power are assigned one as follows:  Power | Moves ----: | -----   160 | One-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold   120 | Counter moves: counter, metal burst, and mirror coat    80 | Variable power or set damage: crush grip, dragon rage, electro ball, endeavor, final gambit, flail, frustration, grass knot, gyro ball, heat crash, heavy slam, hidden power, low kick, natural gift, night shade, psywave, return, reversal, seismic toss, sonic boom, trump card, and wring out     0 | Any such move not listed

name: Unaware
effect_entry: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target's stat changes.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 능력 변화를 무시하고 공격할 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for the purposes of damage and accuracy calculation.  Effectively, this affects modifiers of every stat except Speed.  The power of punishment and stored power is calculated as usual.  When this Pokémon hurts itself in confusion, its stat modifiers affect damage as usual.

name: Tinted Lens
effect_entry: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.
effect_entry_ko: 효과가 별로인 기술을 통상의 위력으로 쓸 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

name: Filter
effect_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 자신이 받는 효과가 굉장한 공격의 위력을 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it.  This ability functions identically to solid rock.

name: Slow Start
effect_entry: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
effect_entry_ko: 5턴 동안 공격과 스피드가 절반이 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack and Speed are halved for five turns upon entering battle.  This ability also takes effect when acquired during battle.  If this Pokémon loses its ability before the five turns are up, its Attack and Speed return to normal; if it then regains this ability without leaving battle, its Attack and Speed are halved again, but the counter keeps counting from where it was.

name: Scrappy
effect_entry: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.
effect_entry_ko: 노말타입과 격투타입 기술을 고스트타입에게 맞힐 수 있다. 위협을 당해도 동요하지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon ignores ghost-type Pokémon's immunity to normal- and fighting-type moves.  Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.

name: Storm Drain
effect_entry: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 물타입의 기술을 자신에게 끌어모아 데미지를 받지 않고 특수공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: All other Pokémon's single-target water-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon, if it is an eligible target.  Other Pokémon's Water moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it.  If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected.  When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon.  follow me takes precedence over this ability.

name: Ice Body
effect_entry: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 눈일 때 HP를 조금씩 회복한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail/snowstorm, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.

name: Solid Rock
effect_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 자신이 받는 효과가 굉장한 공격의 위력을 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it.  This ability functions identically to filter.

name: Snow Warning
effect_entry: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 날씨를 눈으로 만든다.
effect_detail: The weather changes to hail/snowstorm when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or sand stream are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay. If the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, or mysterious air current, this ability will not be activated.

name: Honey Gather
effect_entry: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 배틀이 끝났을 때 달콤한꿀을 주울 때가 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has a chance of picking up honey after each battle.  This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100.  This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.

name: Frisk
effect_entry: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 상대의 지닌 물건을 통찰할 수 있다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.

name: Reckless
effect_entry: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
effect_entry_ko: 반동 데미지를 받는 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power.  struggle is unaffected.  The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.

name: Multitype
effect_entry: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the plate it holds.
effect_entry_ko: 지니고 있는 플레이트나 Z크리스탈 타입에 따라 자신의 타입이 바뀐다. 이 특성은 무시할 수 없다.
effect_detail: If this Pokémon is holding an elemental Plate, its type and form change to match the Plate.  This Pokémon's held item, whether or not it is a Plate, cannot be taken by covet or thief, nor removed by knock off, nor traded by switcheroo or trick.  Covet, Thief, and Knock Off still inflict damage against this Pokémon.  Unlike with sticky hold, this Pokémon cannot use fling, Switcheroo, or Trick to lose its item itself, nor gain an item through Switcheroo or Trick if it does not have one.  This ability has no effect for any Pokémon other than arceus.  This ability cannot be traded with skill swap, nor copied with role play or trace, nor disabled with gastro acid, nor changed with worry seed.  This Pokémon cannot use Skill Swap or Role Play to lose its ability itself.  mold breaker cannot ignore this ability.  If a Pokémon Transforms into an Arceus with this ability, it will Transform into Arceus's default, normal-type form.  If the Transforming Pokémon is holding a Plate, this ability will then activate and change the Pokémon into the corresponding form.

name: Flower Gift
effect_entry: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 맑을 때 자신과 같은 편의 공격과 특수방어의 능력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Friendly Pokémon have 1.5× their Attack and Special Defense during strong sunlight if any friendly Pokémon has this ability.  Unlike forecast, multitype, and zen mode, this ability is not tied to its Pokémon's form change; cherrim will switch between its forms even if it loses this ability.  As such, this ability also works if obtained by a Pokémon other than Cherrim.

name: Bad Dreams
effect_entry: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.
effect_entry_ko: 잠듦 상태의 상대에게 데미지를 준다.
effect_detail: Opposing Pokémon take 1/8 of their maximum HP in damage after each turn while they are asleep.

name: Pickpocket
effect_entry: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.
effect_entry_ko: 자신에게 접촉한 상대의 도구를 훔친다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, if it does not have a held item, it steals the attacker's held item.  This Pokémon cannot steal upon being knocked out.  It can steal if the attacker has a substitute, but cannot steal when its own Substitute is hit.  If a move hits multiple times, only the last hit triggers this ability.  If this Pokémon is wild, it cannot steal from a trained Pokémon.

name: Sheer Force
effect_entry: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon's moves, but increases the moves' power.
effect_entry_ko: 기술의 추가 효과가 없어지지만 그만큼 높은 위력으로 기술을 사용할 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves with extra effects have 1.3× their power, but lose their extra effects.  An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect. For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.  Moves that lower the user's stats are unaffected.

name: Contrary
effect_entry: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them — and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.
effect_entry_ko: 능력의 변화가 역전해서 올라갈 때 떨어지고 떨어질 때 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.

name: Unnerve
effect_entry: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
effect_entry_ko: 상대를 긴장시켜 나무열매를 먹지 못하게 한다.
effect_detail: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.  Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

name: Defiant
effect_entry: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.
effect_entry_ko: 상대에 의해 능력이 떨어지면 공격이 크게 올라간다.
effect_detail: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.  If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.

name: Defeatist
effect_entry: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP drops to half or less.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 절반이 되면 무기력해져서 공격과 특수공격이 반감된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.

name: Cursed Body
effect_entry: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 받으면 상대의 기술을 사슬묶기 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
effect_detail: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.

name: Healer
effect_entry: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon's allies.
effect_entry_ko: 같은 편의 상태 이상을 가끔 회복시킨다.
effect_detail: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.

name: Friend Guard
effect_entry: Reduces damage dealt to allies.
effect_entry_ko: 같은 편의 데미지를 줄일 수 있다.
effect_detail: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.  This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.

name: Weak Armor
effect_entry: The Pokémon's Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 물리 기술로 데미지를 받으면 방어가 떨어지고 스피드가 크게 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.

name: Heavy Metal
effect_entry: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
effect_entry_ko: 자신의 무게가 2배가 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has double the usual weight for its species.

name: Light Metal
effect_entry: Halves the Pokémon's weight.
effect_entry_ko: 자신의 무게가 절반이 된다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has half the usual weight for its species.

name: Multiscale
effect_entry: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 꽉 찼을 때 받는 데미지가 줄어든다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.

name: Toxic Boost
effect_entry: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.
effect_entry_ko: 독 상태가 되었을 때 물리 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Attack when poisoned.

name: Flare Boost
effect_entry: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.
effect_entry_ko: 화상 상태가 되었을 때 특수 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack when burned.

name: Harvest
effect_entry: May create another Berry after one is used.
effect_entry_ko: 사용한 나무열매를 몇 번이고 만들어 낸다.
effect_detail: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.

name: Telepathy
effect_entry: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.
effect_entry_ko: 같은 편의 공격을 간파하여 기술을 회피한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.

name: Moody
effect_entry: Every turn, one of the Pokémon's stats will be boosted sharply, but another stat will be lowered.
effect_entry_ko: 매 턴 능력 중 하나가 크게 오르고 하나가 떨어진다.
effect_detail: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.  If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

name: Overcoat
effect_entry: The Pokémon takes no damage from sandstorms. It is also protected from the effects of powders and spores.
effect_entry_ko: 모래바람에 데미지를 받지 않는다. 가루나 포자의 영향도 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.

name: Poison Touch
effect_entry: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
effect_entry_ko: 접촉하기만 해도 상대를 독 상태로 만들 떄가 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.  This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.

name: Regenerator
effect_entry: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.
effect_entry_ko: 지닌 포켓몬으로 돌아오면 HP를 조금 회복한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon regains 1/3 of its maximum HP when it is switched out for another Pokémon under any circumstances other than having fainted.  This ability does not take effect when a battle ends.

name: Big Pecks
effect_entry: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.
effect_entry_ko: 방어를 떨어뜨리는 효과를 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

name: Sand Rush
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 모래바람일 때 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during a sandstorm, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

name: Wonder Skin
effect_entry: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 변화 기술을 받기 어려운 몸으로 되어 있다.
effect_detail: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

name: Analytic
effect_entry: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it is the last to act that turn.
effect_entry_ko: 제일 마지막에 기술을 쓰면 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn.  future sight and doom desire are unaffected.

name: Illusion
effect_entry: The Pokémon fools opponents by entering battle disguised as the last Pokémon in its Trainer's party.
effect_entry_ko: 지닌 포켓몬 중 제일 뒤에 있는 포켓몬으로 둔갑하여 나와서 상대를 속인다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon, upon being sent out, appears to have the species, nickname, and Poké Ball of the last Pokémon in the party that is able to battle.  This illusion breaks upon being hit by a damaging move.  Other damage, e.g. from weather or spikes, does not break the illusion, nor does damage done to a substitute.  If the party order becomes temporarily shuffled around as Pokémon are switched out in battle, this ability chooses the last Pokémon according to that shuffled order.

name: Imposter
effect_entry: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.
effect_entry_ko: 눈앞의 포켓몬으로 변신해 버린다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle.  This effect is identical to the move transform.

name: Infiltrator
effect_entry: The Pokémon's moves are unaffected by the target's barriers, substitutes, and the like.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 벽이나 대타출동을 뚫고 공격할 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

name: Mummy
effect_entry: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.
effect_entry_ko: 상대가 접촉하면 상대를 미라로 만들어 버린다.
effect_detail: Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy.  multitype is unaffected.  If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

name: Moxie
effect_entry: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it shows moxie, which boosts its Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 상대를 쓰러뜨리면 자신감이 붙어서 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon.  This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes.  If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

name: Justified
effect_entry: When the Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type attack, its Attack stat is boosted by its sense of justice.
effect_entry_ko: 악타입 공격을 받으면 정의감으로 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever a dark-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage.  The move is not negated in any way.

name: Rattled
effect_entry: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.
effect_entry_ko: 악, 고스트, 벌레타입 기술로 공격받거나 위협을 받으면 주눅이 들어 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

name: Magic Bounce
effect_entry: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.
effect_entry_ko: 상대가 쓴 변화 기술을 반사해 그대로 되돌려줄 수 있다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user.  All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable.  A move reflected by this ability or magic coat cannot be reflected back.

name: Sap Sipper
effect_entry: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 풀타입 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.

name: Prankster
effect_entry: Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
effect_entry_ko: 변화 기술을 먼저 쓸 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.

name: Sand Force
effect_entry: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
effect_entry_ko: 날씨가 모래바람일 때 바위타입과 땅타입, 강철타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power.  This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

name: Iron Barbs
effect_entry: The Pokémon's iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact.
effect_entry_ko: 자신에게 접촉한 상대에게 철가시로 데미지를 준다.
effect_detail: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.  This ability functions identically to rough skin.

name: Zen Mode
effect_entry: Changes the Pokémon's shape when its HP drops to half or less.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 절반 이하가 되면 모습이 변화한다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon switches between Standard Mode and Zen Mode after each turn depending on its HP.  Below 50% of its maximum HP, it switches to Zen Mode, and at 50% or above, it switches to Standard Mode.  This Pokémon returns to Standard Mode upon leaving battle or losing this ability.  This ability has no effect if this Pokémon is not a darmanitan.

name: Victory Star
effect_entry: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.
effect_entry_ko: 자신과 같은 편의 명중률이 올라간다.
effect_detail: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.

name: Turboblaze
effect_entry: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
effect_entry_ko: 상대 특성에 방해받지 않고 상대에게 기술을 쓸 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.  For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.  Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.  An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.  When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.  This ability functions identically to mold breaker and teravolt.

name: Teravolt
effect_entry: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
effect_entry_ko: 상대 특성에 방해받지 않고 상대에게 기술을 쓸 수 있다.
effect_detail: This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.  For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.  Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.  An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.  When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.  This ability functions identically to mold breaker and turboblaze.

name: Aroma Veil

effect_entry_ko: 자신과 같은 편으로 향하는 멘탈 공격을 막을 수 있다.

name: Flower Veil
effect_entry: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.
effect_entry_ko: 같은 편의 풀타입 포켓몬은 능력이 떨어지지 않고 상태 이상도 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

name: Cheek Pouch

effect_entry_ko: 나무열매를 먹으면 추가로 HP를 회복한다.

name: Protean
effect_entry: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
effect_entry_ko: 배틀에 나올 때마다 단 한 번 자신이 사용한 기술과 같은 타입으로 변화한다.
effect_detail: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.  The type change takes place just before the move is used.

name: Fur Coat

effect_entry_ko: 상대로부터 받는 물리 기술의 데미지가 절반이 된다.

name: Bulletproof

name: Competitive

effect_entry_ko: 상대에 의해 능력이 떨어지면 특수공격이 크게 올라간다.

effect_entry: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.
effect_entry_ko: 공격 기술을 쓰면 블레이드폼으로 기술 킹실드를 쓰면 실드폼으로 변한다.

name: Surge Surfer

name: Beast Boost

effect_entry_ko: 상대를 기절시켰을 때 자신의 가장 높은 능력이 올라간다.

effect_detail: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.

name: Misty Surge
effect_entry: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 미스트필드를 사용한다.

name: Grassy Surge

effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 그래스필드를 사용한다.
