name: Shadow Shield
effect_entry: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
effect_entry_ko: HP가 꽉 찼을 때 받는 데미지가 줄어든다.
effect_detail: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.  This ability cannot be nullified.

name: Prism Armor
effect_entry: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 자신이 받는 효과가 굉장한 공격의 위력을 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.  This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.

name: Neuroforce
effect_entry: Powers up the Pokémon's supereffective attacks even further.
effect_entry_ko: 효과가 굉장한 공격의 위력이 더욱 올라간다.
effect_detail: Increases super-effective damage dealt to 1.25×.

name: Intrepid Sword
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle for the first time.
effect_entry_ko: 처음 등장했을 때 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dauntless Shield
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle for the first time.
effect_entry_ko: 처음 등장했을 때 방어가 올라간다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Libero
effect_entry: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
effect_entry_ko: 배틀에 나올 때마다 단 한 번 자신이 사용한 기술과 같은 타입으로 변화한다.
effect_detail: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

name: Ball Fetch
effect_entry: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.
effect_entry_ko: 도구를 지니고 있지 않은 경우 첫 번째로 던져서 실패한 몬스터볼을 주워 온다.
effect_detail: At any time after the first Poké Ball is thrown and fails to catch a Pokémon, at the end of a turn, if a Pokémon with Ball Fetch is on the field and not holding another item, it will pick up the same type of ball as the first one thrown.

name: Cotton Down
effect_entry: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 받으면 솜털을 흩뿌려서 자신을 제외한 모든 포켓몬의 스피드를 떨어뜨린다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Propeller Tail
effect_entry: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 기술을 끌어모으는 특성이나 기술의 영향을 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Mirror Armor
effect_entry: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
effect_entry_ko: 자신이 받는 능력 다운 효과에 한해 되받아친다.
effect_detail: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

name: Gulp Missile
effect_entry: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
effect_entry_ko: 파도타기나 다이빙을 쓰면 먹이를 물어 온다. 데미지를 받으면 먹이를 토해 내서 공격한다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

name: Stalwart
effect_entry: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 기술을 끌어모으는 특성이나 기술의 영향을 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Steam Engine
effect_entry: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
effect_entry_ko: 물타입이나 불꽃타입 기술로 공격받으면 스피드가 매우 크게 올라간다.
effect_detail: Raises the user's Speed by three stages when it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type attack. The attack still deals damage.

name: Punk Rock
effect_entry: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.
effect_entry_ko: 소리 기술의 위력이 올라간다. 상대로부터 받는 소리 기술의 데미지는 절반이 된다.
effect_detail: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

name: Sand Spit
effect_entry: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 받으면 모래바람을 일으킨다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by an attack.

name: Ice Scales
effect_entry: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.
effect_entry_ko: 얼음인분의 보호를 받아 특수공격으로 받는 데미지가 절반이 된다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

name: Ripen
effect_entry: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
effect_entry_ko: 나무열매를 숙성시켜서 효과를 2배로 만든다.
effect_detail: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Ice Face
effect_entry: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.
effect_entry_ko: 물리공격을 머리의 얼음이 대신 맞아 주지만 모습도 바뀐다. 얼음은 눈이 내리면 원래대로 돌아온다.
effect_detail: When an Eiscue that's in its Ice Face form is hit by a physical move, it takes no damage and changes into its Noice Face form. If a hailstorm or snowstorm begins while Eiscue is in its Noice Face form, or if it is sent out in its Noice Face form during hail, it will immediately revert to its Ice Face form.

name: Power Spot
effect_entry: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.
effect_entry_ko: 옆에 있기만 해도 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: "The power of moves used by the allies of the Pokémon with Power Spot is increased by 30%."

name: Mimicry
effect_entry: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
effect_entry_ko: 필드의 상태에 따라 포켓몬의 타입이 바뀐다.
effect_detail: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

name: Screen Cleaner
effect_entry: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 상대와 같은 편의 빛의장막, 리플렉터, 오로라베일의 효과가 사라진다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

name: Steely Spirit
effect_entry: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.
effect_entry_ko: 같은 편의 강철타입 공격의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

name: Perish Body
effect_entry: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
effect_entry_ko: 접촉하는 기술로 공격받으면 3턴 후에 양쪽 모두 기절한다. 교체되면 효과가 없어진다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.

name: Wandering Spirit
effect_entry: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
effect_entry_ko: 접촉하는 기술로 공격해 온 포켓몬과 특성을 바꾼다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Gorilla Tactics
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat, but only allows the use of the first selected move.
effect_entry_ko: 공격이 올라가지만 처음에 선택한 기술 외에는 쓸 수 없게 된다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

name: Neutralizing Gas
effect_entry: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect_entry_ko: 화학변화가스를 가진 포켓몬이 배틀에 나와 있으면 모든 포켓몬이 가진 특성의 효과가 사라지거나 발동하지 않게 된다.
effect_detail: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

name: Pastel Veil
effect_entry: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.
effect_entry_ko: 자신과 같은 편은 독 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: Prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.

name: Hunger Switch
effect_entry: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.
effect_entry_ko: 턴이 끝날 때마다 배부른 모양, 배고픈 모양, 배부른 모양...으로 번갈아서 모습을 바꾼다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

name: Quick Draw
effect_entry: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
effect_entry_ko: 상대보다 먼저 행동할 수도 있다.
effect_detail: If a Pokémon with this Ability selects a damaging move, it has a 30% chance of going first in its priority bracket.

name: Unseen Fist
effect_entry: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
effect_entry_ko: 상대에게 접촉하는 기술을 사용하면 방어의 효과를 무시하고 공격할 수 있다.
effect_detail: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Curious Medicine
effect_entry: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 조개껍질에서 약을 흩뿌려서 같은 편의 능력 변화를 원래대로 되돌린다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

name: Transistor
effect_entry: Powers up Electric-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 전기타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Increases the power of Electric-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

name: Dragon's Maw
effect_entry: Powers up Dragon-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 드래곤타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

name: Chilling Neigh
effect_entry: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.
effect_entry_ko: 상대를 쓰러뜨리면 차가운 울음소리를 내면서 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Grim Neigh
effect_entry: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
effect_entry_ko: 상대를 쓰러뜨리면 무서운 울음소리를 내면서 특수공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: As One
effect_entry: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.
effect_entry_ko: 버드렉스의 긴장감과 블리자포스의 백의울음 두 가지 특성을 겸비한다.
effect_detail: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

name: As One
effect_entry: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.
effect_entry_ko: 버드렉스의 긴장감과 레이스포스의 흑의울음 두 가지 특성을 겸비한다.
effect_detail: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

name: Lingering Aroma
effect_entry: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.
effect_entry_ko: 상대가 접촉하면 가시지 않는 향기가 상대에게 배어 버린다.
effect_detail: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Lingering Aroma.

name: Seed Sower
effect_entry: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
effect_entry_ko: 공격을 받으면 필드를 그래스필드로 만든다.
effect_detail: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

name: Thermal Exchange
effect_entry: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
effect_entry_ko: 불꽃타입 기술로 공격받으면 공격이 올라간다. 화상 상태가 되지 않는다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

name: Anger Shell
effect_entry: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 공격에 의해 HP가 절반이 되면 화가 나서 방어와 특수방어가 떨어지지만 공격, 특수공격, 스피드가 올라간다.
effect_detail: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Purifying Salt
effect_entry: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 깨끗한 소금에 의해 상태 이상이 되지 않는다. 고스트타입 기술의 데미지를 반감시킨다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

name: Well-Baked Body
effect_entry: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.
effect_entry_ko: 불꽃타입 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 방어가 크게 올라간다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

name: Wind Rider
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
effect_entry_ko: 순풍이 불거나 바람 기술로 공격받으면 데미지를 받지 않고 공격이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

name: Guard Dog
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
effect_entry_ko: 위협을 받으면 공격이 올라간다. 포켓몬을 교체시키는 기술이나 도구의 효과를 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

name: Rocky Payload
effect_entry: Powers up Rock-type moves.
effect_entry_ko: 바위타입 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Increases the power of Rock-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

name: Wind Power
effect_entry: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
effect_entry_ko: 바람 기술을 받으면 충전 상태가 된다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

name: Zero to Hero
effect_entry: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
effect_entry_ko: 지닌 포켓몬으로 돌아오면 마이티폼으로 변한다
effect_detail: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

name: Commander
effect_entry: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 같은 편에 어써러셔가 있으면 입속에 들어가 안에서 지시를 내린다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

name: Electromorphosis
effect_entry: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
effect_entry_ko: 데미지를 받으면 충전 상태가 된다.
effect_detail: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

name: Protosynthesis
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
effect_entry_ko: 부스트에너지를 지니고 있거나 날씨가 맑을 때 가장 높은 능력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Quark Drive
effect_entry: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
effect_entry_ko: 부스트에너지를 지니고 있거나 일렉트릭필드일 때 가장 높은 능력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

name: Good as Gold
effect_entry: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.
effect_entry_ko: 산화하지 않는 튼튼한 황금몸 덕분에 상대의 변화 기술의 영향을 받지 않는다.
effect_detail: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon’s status moves.

name: Vessel of Ruin
effect_entry: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entry_ko: 이 특성을 가진 포켓몬을 제외한 모든 포켓몬의 특수공격을 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Sword of Ruin
effect_entry: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entry_ko: 이 특성을 가진 포켓몬을 제외한 모든 포켓몬의 방어를 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Tablets of Ruin
effect_entry: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entry_ko: 이 특성을 가진 포켓몬을 제외한 모든 포켓몬의 공격을 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Beads of Ruin
effect_entry: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entry_ko: 이 특성을 가진 포켓몬을 제외한 모든 포켓몬의 특수방어를 약하게 만든다.
effect_detail: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Orichalcum Pulse
effect_entry: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 날씨를 맑음으로 만든다. 햇살이 강하면 고대의 고동에 의해 공격이 강화된다.
effect_detail: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight. If the weather is extremely harsh sunlight, heavy rain, or mysterious air current, this ability will not be activated.

name: Hadron Engine
effect_entry: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 일렉트릭필드를 전개한다. 일렉트릭필드일 때 미래 기관에 의해 특수공격이 강화된다.
effect_detail: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Opportunist
effect_entry: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.
effect_entry_ko: 상대의 능력이 올라가면 자신도 편승해서 똑같이 능력을 올린다.
effect_detail: If an opponent’s stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

name: Cud Chew
effect_entry: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
effect_entry_ko: 한 번에 한하여 나무열매를 먹으면 다음 턴이 끝날 때 위에서 꺼내서 또 먹는다.
effect_detail: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

name: Sharpness
effect_entry: Powers up slicing moves.
effect_entry_ko: 상대를 베는 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
effect_detail: Increases the power of all 'slicing' moves by 50%.

name: Supreme Overlord
effect_entry: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
effect_entry_ko: 등장했을 때 지금까지 쓰러진 같은 편의 수가 많을수록 조금씩 공격과 특수공격이 올라간다.
